languages.text: "Ты слышала Паскаля — кардинал Анвилас примет почетную смерть и продолжит служить вере как часть священной машины".
languages.translation_comment:
Запускается этюд VP_CardinalPenance
Дать нормально так механизмов и грузов священных масел
Оставляем кардинала в живых — он уходит на свою личную казнь
Весы направо

Запускается этюд VP_CardinalPenance

Весы направо

languages.text: "You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."
languages.original_text: "Ты слышала Паскаля — кардинал Анвилас примет почетную смерть и продолжит служить вере как часть священной машины".

traits.locale_text: "You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."
"You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."
"You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."
"You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."
"You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."
"You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."

languages.text: "Ihr habt Pasqal gehört. Kardinal Anvylas wird ehrenhaft sterben und dem Glauben als Teil einer heiligen Maschine weiter dienen."
languages.original_text: "You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt Pasqal gehört. Kardinal Anvylas wird ehrenhaft sterben und dem Glauben als Teil einer heiligen Maschine weiter dienen."

languages.text: « Vous avez entendu Pasqal. Le cardinal Anvylas mourra avec les honneurs et continuera à servir la foi en intégrant les rouages d'une machine sacrée. »
languages.original_text: "You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez entendu Pasqal. Le cardinal Anvylas mourra avec les honneurs et continuera à servir la foi en intégrant les rouages d'une machine sacrée. »

languages.text: “你应该听到帕斯卡的话了。红衣主教安维拉斯会光荣赴死，死后会成为神圣机械的一部分，继续为信仰服务。”
languages.original_text: "You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."

traits.locale_text: “你应该听到帕斯卡的话了。红衣主教安维拉斯会光荣赴死，死后会成为神圣机械的一部分，继续为信仰服务。”

languages.text: «Ha oído a Pasqal. El cardenal Anvylas morirá de forma honrada y seguirá sirviendo a la fe como parte de una máquina sagrada».
languages.original_text: "You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."

traits.locale_text: «Ha oído a Pasqal. El cardenal Anvylas morirá de forma honrada y seguirá sirviendo a la fe como parte de una máquina sagrada».

languages.text: 「パスカルの言葉を聞いただろう。アンビラス枢機卿は名誉ある死を遂げ、聖なる機械の一部として信仰に仕え続けることになる」
languages.original_text: "You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカルの言葉を聞いただろう。アンビラス枢機卿は名誉ある死を遂げ、聖なる機械の一部として信仰に仕え続けることになる」

languages.text: "Pasqal doğru söylüyor. Kardinal Anvylas, şerefiyle ölecek ve kutsal makinenin bir parçası olarak inanca hizmeti sürdürecek."
languages.original_text: "You heard Pasqal. Cardinal Anvylas shall die an honourable death and continue to serve the faith as part of a sacred machine."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal doğru söylüyor. Kardinal Anvylas, şerefiyle ölecek ve kutsal makinenin bir parçası olarak inanca hizmeti sürdürecek."
